metadata.name: Rivaj UK Deep Cleansing Black Mask Whitening Complex 6pcs

content:
**Rivaj UK Deep Cleansing Black Mask Whitening Complex (6pcs)**

Achieve a brighter, more radiant complexion with the Rivaj UK Deep Cleansing Black Mask Whitening Complex. This powerful mask combines the deep cleansing properties of Charcoal with the soothing benefits of Aloe Vera to effectively target blackheads and dull skin.  Ideal for oily and combination skin types, this mask helps to draw out impurities and reveal a whiter, healthier-looking complexion.

**Key Benefits:**

* **Deep Cleansing:** Charcoal acts like a magnet to extract dirt, oil, and blackheads from deep within pores.
* **Whitening Complex:**  Helps to brighten and even out skin tone for a more radiant appearance.
* **Soothing Aloe Vera:**  Balances the deep cleansing action of charcoal with the calming and hydrating properties of Aloe Vera.

**How to Use:**

Apply an even layer of the mask to clean, dry skin, avoiding the eye area. Allow the mask to dry completely before gently peeling it off.  Use weekly for optimal results.

**Important Considerations:**

While generally safe, individuals with sensitivity to charcoal should avoid using this product.  In rare cases, some may experience mild irritation.  If irritation occurs, discontinue use.  This product is formulated with standard ingredient concentrations.

This natural, high-concentration formula combines the power of Turmeric and Walnut to effectively exfoliate your skin and remove tan, leaving you with a brighter, more even complexion.  Suitable for all skin types, this scrub is designed for weekly use.  Simply massage onto your face for 2-3 minutes and rinse.  While generally safe, those with walnut sensitivities should avoid use.  For best results on dry skin, consider using a gentler touch to avoid harshness.  Experience the traditional benefits of Ubtan with this tan-removing scrub, priced at LKR2716.60.

metadata.name: Neutrogena Deep Clean Facial Cleanser 200ml

content: Neutrogena Deep Clean Facial Cleanser (200ml) is a natural, daily cleanser specially formulated for oily and acne-prone skin.  Powered by Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA), this cleanser deeply penetrates pores to effectively remove excess oil and help clear acne.  Simply apply to a wet face, lather, and rinse. While this formula delivers a deep clean, it may cause dryness in some individuals.  If you are sensitive to Beta Hydroxy Acid, please avoid using this product.  Experience the refreshing power of Neutrogena Deep Clean and reveal clearer, healthier-looking skin for LKR 2890.00.
